info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 4:58PM EDT until August 07 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Louisa County in central Virginia... North central Fluvanna County in central Virginia... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 457 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Charlottesville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Boswells Tavern around 520 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Pendleton, Louisa Airport, Waldrop, Green Springs, Byrd Mill, Trevilians, Wares Crossroads, Zion Crossroads, Vawter Corner, and Union Mills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central Virginia.
